title: Order a 'For Sale' Sign
description: For a new listing, the agent needs to order the installation of a 'For Sale' sign at the property.

tasks.description: Identify the listing address and the agent's name and contact info to be displayed on the sign rider.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all necessary information for the sign order.

tasks.description: Contact the preferred sign installation company with the order details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully places the order with the vendor.

tasks.description: Confirm with the vendor that the sign has been installed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives confirmation and logs it in the transaction file.
